Text:
All Hail Blackcanary !!
Thanx for making my collection complete.

blackcanary, you are doing an AMAZING job on here!! Many, many thanks. May I make a request? X-Men (v3) (2010-2013). That series is ending soon and it would be GREATLY appreciated to get the full run on TPB (before v4 starts).

Great up, thank you kindly.

Any of chance of getting the issues released when it was just X-Men. I have from 116 on, but its a bit expensive for me to buy the rest at this point.
